ground_truth.thought: 获取该客户的收入和负债情况
ground_truth.name: IncomeStatement.get_income_and_liabilities

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CreditReport.get_report', 'description': 'Get the credit report of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the credit report of the client'}]}, {'name': 'IncomeStatement.get_income_and_liabilities', 'description': 'Get the income and liabilities of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'income', 'description': 'the income of the client'}, {'name': 'liabilities', 'description': 'the liabilities of the client'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_score', 'description': 'Get the credit score of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'score', 'description': 'the credit score of the client'}]}, {'name': 'LoanApproval.provide_recommendation', 'description': 'Provide a loan approval recommendation based on the client's credit history stability.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendation', 'description': 'the loan approval recommendation'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名信贷分析师，需要评估某客户的信用贷款申请。首先，我需要获取该客户的信用报告。然后，获取该客户的收入和负债情况。接下来，获取该客户的信用评分。最后，请提供一些基于信用历史稳定性的贷款审批建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取该客户的信用报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'client_id'的值是什么?
{'report': 'Client has a history of timely payments with no defaults.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'Client has a history of timely payments with no defaults.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取客户的信用报告，以了解其信用历史和支付记录。
